column4: I have a Dell Inspiron 1501 (mostly with the same parts that it came with out of the box, except I have a different HD), with a Sigmatel chipset. Sound worked fine at first, but when I finally got NDISwrapper to work, all of the sound became a crackling noise. Could someone tell me how to install the driver that I need to install from the CD? I've looked around on the internet and I've seen questions similar to this one, but none of the
let us see lspci in paste.ubuntu.com
